column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Although the food is not cheap
column2: it is not crazy expensive and well worth every penny.  The steak
column3: every cut is always superb and cooked
column4: seasoned and garnished to perfection.  My favorite is the filet.  I was once talked into ordering their burger over a steak and again
column5: was blown away. I have not met a side dish that they offer that I did not thoroughly enjoy.  Although
column6: I think I may be addicted to the elote.  It will change your life.
